### Speakers  
Eric Anthony (UCSF Fed Govt Relations),  
Amiee Alden (UCSF State Govt Relations)

Are you passionate about making a difference but don't know where to start? Join us for Advocacy 101 to learn the basics of effective advocacy as scientists. This in-person event will discuss UCSF's role in local, state and federal policy advocacy presented by Eric Anthony and Amiee Alden, Senior Directors of Federal and State Relations in the Office of Community and Government Relations. Learn how you can engage in outreach and advocacy efforts, then join our happy hour to network with other advocates and build connections to foster new advocacy opportunities!
